function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Disrupted livelihoods, economic recession, and widespread infection","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict measures to separate and reduce infection rates","Technologies":"Public health measures, testing and surveillance technologies","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and government authorities","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, and public health agencies"}]}
